\SetAPI{J}
\section{database.pool.maxunused}
\label{configuration:DatabasePoolMaxunused}
\ClearAPI
Maximal number of unused connections in the connection pool. If the limit is exceeded all further connections which are not used anymore are closed and removed from the pool. Valid values are all numbers > 0, default is 2.

\type{de.osthus.ambeth.persistence.config.PersistenceConfigurationConstants.DatabasePoolMaxUnused}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{database.pool.maxunused}}]

\end{lstlisting}
